definition: system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Ren Jie, video maker and bandsman, lives in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 任杰，录像制作者，乐手，现居北京。

sentences.english: Content fabricant often oversight this problem.
sentences.chinese: 内容制作者经常忽略这个问题。

sentences.english: But spammers are a creative bunch.
sentences.chinese: 然而，垃圾邮件制作者是很有创造力的一群人。

sentences.english: Spammers also need lots of addresses to evade the filters.
sentences.chinese: 垃圾邮件制作者们同样需要很多地址来躲避过滤器。

sentences.english: The especially personal website is also the reaction of the fabricator character.
sentences.chinese: 特别是个人网站更是制作者个性的反应。

sentences.english: That has dramatically altered the kind of projects modders can take on.
sentences.chinese: 这戏剧性的改变了游戏制作者可以着手的项目类型。

sentences.english: Lasseter is one of the most successful animators in Hollywood.
sentences.chinese: 雷斯特是好莱坞最成功的动漫制作者之一。

sentences.english: Sans compares Liu to a filmmaker.
sentences.chinese: 桑斯把刘先生和一位电影制作者相比较。

sentences.english: The filmmakers offer a day-in-the-life portrait of a city from dawn until dusk.
sentences.chinese: 电影制作者展示了一个城市从清晨到黄昏的景象。

sentences.english: Now TV producers are set to re-shoot the plays.
sentences.chinese: 而如今，电视制作者又致力于对名着进行翻拍。

sentences.english: The printmaker first draws an image onto a smooth piece of wood.
sentences.chinese: 首先，制作者在一块光滑的木头上画出一个图像。

sentences.english: Fabricators joined components with stainless-steel hardware.
sentences.chinese: 制作者用不锈钢五金器件将零件固定在一起。

sentences.english: Now TV producers are set to reshoot the plays.
sentences.chinese: 而如今，电视制作者又致力于对名著进行翻拍。

sentences.english: Microsoft is now openly courting modders.
sentences.chinese: 现在，微软正在公开追求游戏制作者。

sentences.english: To simulate years of usage, bulb makers rely on heat.
sentences.chinese: 灯泡制作者使用热量来模拟使用年限。

definition: to make a copy/to reproduce/to remake (a movie)
to copy/to imitate/to make by imitating a model
to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
original and ingenious (idiom)/to show great creativity
